name: Stranded (itch) (Szym)
description:
This game was made in 48h for the Kenney Game Jam 2021 with the theme "Rotation" using only Kenney's visual assets.

This is the end...

Your whole squad is dead.

Your left thruster is busted, sending you spinning endlessly, in the cold darkness of space.

The Imperial fleet is closing up on you to finish the job; and your blasters are offline...

But you won't go quietly...

Your tractor beam is still operational. It is too weak to affect their ships, but you're in the middle of an asteroid field.

You will smash as many of their ships as you can ! They will follow you in death !

FOR THE REPUBLIC !

Sprites, Sounds & Fonts by Kenney

Musics : 

"Tyrant" by Kevin MacLeod

"Beauty Flow" by Kevin MacLeod
